<script setup lang="ts">
import { useAnimate, stagger } from 'motion-v'
import type { AnimatedIconProps, AnimatedIconHandle } from '../types/types'

withDefaults(defineProps<AnimatedIconProps>(), {
  size: 24,
  color: 'currentColor',
  strokeWidth: 2,
  className: ''
})

const [scope, animate] = useAnimate()

const start = () => {
  animate(
    '.speed-line',
    { x: [0, -2, 0] },
    {
      duration: 0.4,
      ease: 'easeInOut',
      delay: stagger(0.1),
      repeat: 1
    }
  )
}

const stop = () => {
  animate('.speed-line', { x: 0 }, { duration: 0.2 })
}

defineExpose({
  startAnimation: start,
  stopAnimation: stop
} satisfies AnimatedIconHandle)
</script>

<template>
  <svg
    ref="scope"
    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
    :width="size"
    :height="size"
    viewBox="0 0 24 24"
    fill="none"
    :stroke="color"
    :stroke-width="strokeWidth"
    stroke-linecap="round"
    stroke-linejoin="round"
    :class="['cursor-pointer', className]"
    @mouseenter="start"
    @mouseleave="stop"
  >
    <path stroke="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none" />

    <!-- G -->
    <path
      d="M15.695 14.305c1.061 1.06 2.953 .888 4.226 -.384c1.272 -1.273 1.444 -3.165 .384 -4.226c-1.061 -1.06 -2.953 -.888 -4.226 .384c-1.272 1.273 -1.444 3.165 -.384 4.226z"
    />
    <!-- O -->
    <path
      d="M12.68 9.233c-1.084 -.497 -2.545 -.191 -3.591 .846c-1.284 1.273 -1.457 3.165 -.388 4.226c1.07 1.06 2.978 .888 4.261 -.384a3.669 3.669 0 0 0 1.038 -1.921h-2.427"
    />

    <!-- Speed lines - these animate -->
    <path class="speed-line" d="M5.5 15h-1.5" />
    <path class="speed-line" d="M6 9h-2" />
    <path class="speed-line" d="M5 12h-3" />
  </svg>
</template>
